subject: Re: [junit] NEW MEMBER
msgSnippet: Try HttpUnit, HtmlUnit or jWebUnit. These allow you to test your JSP, when it is available on a webserver. The jWebUnit project also includes a
messageBody:
Try HttpUnit, HtmlUnit or jWebUnit. These allow you to test your JSP,
when it is available on a webserver. The jWebUnit project also includes
a JettyTestDecorator that allows you to start Jetty, run your tests and
stop Jetty.

Martijn

Shrikant K.S wrote:

> Hi i am a new member of this group. I want to know how
> to test jsp pages using junit?
>
> i have jsp page which contains java code in the form
> of scriplet.
> So any help from yahoo group members?
>
> Thanks well in advace.
>
> Shrikant
